external_games.name: Be a Poker Champion! Texas Hold'em

name: Be a Poker Champion! Texas Hold'em
summary: Texas Hold 'em has been a long-time favorite at casino tables all over the world. Now you can sharpen your poker skills in-game! Take on a variety of AI opponents with different play styles and skill levels. Fair and honest AI allows you to focus on upping your game! Hints, hand analysis, and other support features give you the advice you need, when you need it. Accessible to all players, no experience required! Prove your card smarts at ring games across six distinct locales. Clear three stages to claim victory at five different tournaments. Brush up on the rules and hone your skills in the poker lab. Analyze your playing style with game data records. Reinforce your fundamentals with the tutorial.
